旝旝旝

旝字的基本解释

旝
kuài
古代作战时指挥用的旗子：“旝动而鼓。”
古代作战用的发射石块的器械：“命护军将军田茂广造云旝三百具，以机发石，为攻城械。”
发射的石块：“身当矢旝，再对贼锋。”

旝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuài］
［《廣韻》古外切，去泰，見。］
(1)古代作战时用的一种令旗。
(2)古代作战时用的一种发石器械。

旝字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【方字部】　旝； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页485第15
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?古外切，音儈。【說文】建大木，置石其上，發機以追敵也。詩曰：其旝如林。○按《詩·大雅》今作會。　又【左傳·桓五年】旝動而鼓。【註】旝，旃也。通帛爲之，蓋今大將之麾也。執以爲號令。【後漢·馬融傳】旃旝摻其如林。

旝字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
旝字的起名意思

暂无。

Hiccup
Basic explanation of words
Hiccup
kuài
The flag used for command in ancient battles: "Hiccups and drums."
The weapon used in ancient warfare to launch stones: "The guard general Tian Shigehiro made three hundred cloud hiccups, and the stone was used as a siege weapon."
The stone launched: "Be a hiccup, and then confront the thief."
Hiccup
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuài］
["Guangyun" ancient outside cut, go to Thailand, see you. ]
(1) A flag used in ancient warfare.
(2) A stone-producing tool used in ancient warfare.
Hiccup
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Mao Jixia】【Fangzi Department】　旝; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 485 No. 15
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Ancient outside cut, sound and sound. [Said the text] Build a big tree, place a stone on it, and launch an opportunity to chase the enemy. The poem said: Its hiccups are like forests. ○Press "Poetry·Daya" for this work meeting.　[Zuo Zhuan·Han Five Years] Hiccups and drums. [Note] Hiccup, Yanya. Through the silk for it, it is also the general of the present. Take orders. [Later Han·Ma Rong Biography] 旃旝 mixed with it like a forest.
Hiccup
